channel.title: Hitpoints update mask
channel.description:
Hello!
I just have a simple question(I hope so, lol):
How do I make a hitpoints update mask come up? In my thieving method I have it so if you fail to thieve, the npc stuns you, shows the GFX, and reduces damage.
[code]getOwner().decreaseHP(getDamage());[/code]
The thing is, when I fail, it decrease my hitpoints and all. BUT, it doesn't show and update mask. It just does the block emote and decreases my hitpoints.
I want it to show and update mask for my hitpoints(the damage done), but I'm not sure how I would go about doing this...
I appreciate any help.
Thanks in advance, -Skullator

item.title: Hitpoints update mask
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Hello!

I just have a simple question(I hope so, lol):

How do I make a hitpoints update mask come up? In my thieving method I have it so if you fail to thieve, the npc stuns you, shows the GFX, and reduces damage.

getOwner().decreaseHP(getDamage());

The thing is, when I fail, it decrease my hitpoints and all. BUT, it doesn’t show and update mask. It just does the block emote and decreases my hitpoints.

I want it to show and update mask for my hitpoints(the damage done), but I’m not sure how I would go about doing this…

I appreciate any help.

Thanks in advance,
-Skullator
